author: Lon.TV
description:
Get a Plex Pass: http://lon.tv/plexpass (compensated affiliate link) - Plex announced that music and photos will be returning to Plex apps - including the mobile app and the upcoming TV app revision. You can see the TV integration in the latest Roku preview in this video. See more Plex: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
